name: talking-console
description: Override console methods to provide a console that talks

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && NODE_ENV=browser bili src/talking-console.js --file-name talking-console.js --format umd --module-name talking-console --bundle-node-modules --minify --no-map
scripts.release: standard-version && npm run build && git push --follow-tags && npm publish

author: Bruno Bonnin
